definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: Tarrou, the chief fighter against the disease, is infected and dies.
sentences.chinese: 对抗疾病的先锋塔鲁却染病身亡。

sentences.english: It remains a historic mystery whether Emperor Yongzheng was murdered.
sentences.chinese: 是否被刺身亡至今仍是一个历史的谜案。

sentences.english: The next day, Kenzo was killed and Akimi disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，健三被杀身亡，雅美也不见了踪影。

sentences.english: More than 50 people in the Libyan capital Tripoli have died after drinking tainted alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚首都的黎波里50多人饮用毒酒身亡。

sentences.english: He was dead, killed in a hail of bullets.
sentences.chinese: 他在一阵弹雨中中弹身亡。

sentences.english: At least 15 of Miss Bhutto’s followers were also killed.
sentences.chinese: 至少15位布托的随从也遭袭身亡。

sentences.english: Some people unluckily achieve suicide when they only meant to attempt it.
sentences.chinese: 一些人只是想尝试一下自杀，但却不幸真的身亡了。

sentences.english: Cora worshippers painter Arthur but suicide in the home.
sentences.chinese: 科拉的崇拜者画家亚瑟却在家中自杀身亡。

sentences.english: But we have no idea how or why they died.
sentences.chinese: 但我们却并不知道他们为何身亡。

sentences.english: She got stuck in the elevator and she suffocated.
sentences.chinese: 她被困在电梯里，窒息身亡。

sentences.english: The original minister Iraq suicide east, section chief today also missing west.
sentences.chinese: 原来部长伊东自杀身亡，科长今西也同时失踪。

sentences.english: President J. F. K. was assassinated.
sentences.chinese: 肯尼迪总统是遇刺身亡的。

sentences.english: The unrests have killed 74 people and injured 530.
sentences.chinese: 截至目前，已有74人在政变中身亡，530人受伤。

sentences.english: The teenager died at an illegal boot camp for Internet addicts.
sentences.chinese: 这个孩子在一家非法“网瘾训练营”不幸身亡。

sentences.english: The younger brother died of his injuries.
sentences.chinese: 而弟弟因伤势过重不治身亡。

sentences.english: Families often mask suicide deaths as accidents.
sentences.chinese: 家人常常把自杀者说成是意外身亡。

definition: to die of illness or injury despite receiving medical help
to fall off or jump off a building
to send or deliver to the hospital
to meet with disaster/to die tragically
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to meet violent death/to get killed
